Bash(python3 - << 'EOF'
with open\('/Users/harvey/Desktop/project/2026/trackB/tokamak-agent/src/chat/chatPanel.ts', 'r'\) as f:
    lines = f.readlines\(\)

total = len\(lines\)

# Ranges to remove \(0-based, inclusive\):
# 1. getSystemPromptForMode + parseFileOperations: indices 792-1173
# 2. Skills methods \(loadSkillsFromFolder through parseSlashCommand\) + blank line: indices 2278-2374  
# 3. getHtmlContent: indices 2386-4188

# Do it in reverse order to avoid index shifting
# First build the set of indices to keep
remove_ranges = [
    \(792, 1173\),  # getSystemPromptForMode + parseFileOperations
    \(2278, 2374\), # skills methods
    \(2386, 4188\), # getHtmlContent
]

keep = set\(range\(total\)\)
for start, end in remove_ranges:
    for i in range\(start, end + 1\):
        keep.discard\(i\)

new_lines = [lines[i] for i in sorted\(keep\)]

print\(f"Original lines: {total}"\)
print\(f"Lines to remove: {total - len\(new_lines\)}"\)
print\(f"New total: {len\(new_lines\)}"\)

# Sanity checks
print\("\\nAround getSystemPromptForMode removal:"\)
# Line around index 792 in new:
# In original, line 792 = 'getSystemPromptForMode', line 791 = '\\n', line 1173 ends the section
# After removal, lines 791 and 1174 should be adjacent
orig_791 = lines[791].rstrip\(\)
orig_1174 = lines[1174].rstrip\(\)
print\(f"  Before gap \(orig 791\): {orig_791}"\)
print\(f"  After gap \(orig 1174\): {orig_1174}"\)

print\("\\nAround skills removal:"\)
orig_2277 = lines[2277].rstrip\(\)
orig_2375 = lines[2375].rstrip\(\)
print\(f"  Before gap \(orig 2277\): {orig_2277}"\)
print\(f"  After gap \(orig 2375\): {orig_2375}"\)

print\("\\nAround getHtmlContent removal:"\)
orig_2385 = lines[2385].rstrip\(\)
orig_4189 = lines[4189].rstrip\(\) if 4189 < total else "\(EOF\)"
print\(f"  Before gap \(orig 2385\): {orig_2385}"\)
print\(f"  After gap \(orig 4189\): {orig_4189}"\)

with open\('/Users/harvey/Desktop/project/2026/trackB/tokamak-agent/src/chat/chatPanel.ts', 'w'\) as f:
    f.writelines\(new_lines\)

print\(f"\\nFile written successfully with {len\(new_lines\)} lines"\)
EOF)
